amendment.description: Amendment makes an addition to the short title of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment that would add a short title to the bill "Check 21 Act.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hart amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Hart.
